SpongeBob SquarePants themed restaurant: Create a restaurant that fully immerses customers in the world of Bikini Bottom. Decorate the walls with bright colors and sea creatures, and serve dishes inspired by the show, such as Krabby Patties, Chum Bucket Chili, and Jellyfish Jambalaya. Hire actors to dress up as SpongeBob, Patrick, Squidward, and Mr. Krabs to interact with customers and take orders.

SpongeBob-themed escape room: Design an escape room that takes players through a series of challenges and puzzles inspired by the show. Each room represents a different location from the series, such as Bikini Bottom, the Chum Bucket, and the Fry Cook Island. Players must work together to solve problems and unlock secrets to escape each room before time runs out.

SpongeBob-themed video game: Create a platformer video game where players control SpongeBob as he navigates through levels inspired by different episodes of the show. Players must collect jellyfish, defeat enemies, and solve puzzles to progress through the levels. Include special abilities, such as the ability to transform into a giant sponge, and power-ups, such as a jellyfish boost that allows players to swim faster.

SpongeBob-themed amusement park ride: Design an amusement park ride that simulates the adventures of SpongeBob and his friends. The ride takes passengers through a series of scenes inspired by different episodes, such as the Chum Bucket, the Fry Cook Island, and the Bikini Bottom Jail. Passengers must work together to solve puzzles and overcome obstacles to progress through the ride.

SpongeBob-themed scavenger hunt: Organize a scavenger hunt that takes participants through different locations in a city or town, each inspired by a different location from the show. Clues and challenges along the way lead participants to different locations, such as the Chum Bucket, the Krusty Krab, and the Bikini Bottom Jail. The first team to complete all the challenges and find all the locations wins.
